title: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou: Arifureta Yorimichi de Sekai Saikyou
content:
Yet another shitpost.

As this is just an unaired episode included in the first Blu-ray volume, there isn't much to say in terms of plot or character development. However, it's still worth noting that the episode doesn't offer anything particularly groundbreaking or essential to the story. It's more of a fun, lighthearted extra that fans of the series may enjoy.

In terms of animation and sound, there's nothing particularly noteworthy to mention. It's all fairly average and consistent with the quality of the main series. The characters also remain largely the same, without any significant growth or development.

Overall, I would give this unaired episode a solid 4/10.While it's not essential viewing for fans of the series, it's still a fun addition that offers a bit of lighthearted entertainment. Plus, it's always nice to see more of the characters we've grown to love.
